hackathon-description-text: Do you want to build something cool on Raspberry Pi over Spring Break? Join Hackberry Pi Week with a team of up to 4 students and receive a FREE* Raspberry Pi 3 kit!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: All teams who submitted projects are winners! It is not easy to come up with a project from scratch, on a technology that most participants had no experience with. We will be giving out our extra Raspberry Pi 2 Kits to teams with multiple members, so each member can have their own kit!

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=4902 Forbes Ave, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, USA
hackathon-description-header: We supply the Raspberry Pi's and pies, you build something cool in 314 hours! Sponsored by Microsoft
